page.title: 11Research,Machinery,Workplace
page.content: General research is carried out by many companies into scales, preferences, greater efficiency and an evaluation of products. Individual companies are involved in geological research, pressure control and techniques for pest control. Most companies appeared to have continuing polices of investing in new machinery despite the considerable expense involved. Using the parents of the children of Halsford Park Primary and Blackwell Junior Schools as a sample survey we found that 26% of fathers and 87% of mothers worked in East Grinstead. A further 5% of both parents worked within 10km, another 10% within 20km and a further 28% travelled up to 50km a day. Of the fathers, 5 work away from home, in the North Sea (2),Italy, New York and Hong Kong.
